coordinated_actions.goal: Enhance community religious devotion and cohesion by allocating more resources to spiritual functions.
coordinated_actions.operational_plan: The Tribal Elder will oversee an adjustment to tithe collection. The Shaman/Priest will ensure these resources are used for community rituals and spiritual guidance.
coordinated_actions.risk_notes: Potential for reduced immediate resources for secular community needs.
coordinated_actions.justification: The accepted proposal aims to strengthen societal cohesion and religious influence.
